ABOUT.TITLE: Bastien Record
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION1: I am currently in an apprenticeship for a Full Stack MBA Developer, at the company Mobix, where I specialize in web development and AI. My professional goal is to become a full-stack developer, with a particular passion for innovative technologies and creating interactive tools.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION2: Apart from IT, sport plays an important place in my life. I played basketball for 9 years, and I had the opportunity to pass on my passion as a coach for 2 years. Following an injury, I had to stop playing basketball, but I found another way to stay active by devoting myself to bodybuilding.
